Senior Vice President, Brokerage and Specialized Products

Senior Vice President in Schwab Operational Services, the organization which handles all operational transactions for Schwab's clients. Responsible for the Brokerage and Specialized Products division, which includes Alternative Investments, New Account Services, International Operations, Managed Account Operations, Retirement and Estate processing, Restricted Stock Services, our Affiliated Funds Transfer Agent Oversight , Specialized Hotlines and Schwab's print and mail services.
Responsible for the operations teams supporting Schwab's mutual fund business.  Includes our One Source platform and our proprietary mutual funds.  Have teams located in San Francisco and Phoenix.

recommendations: Financial Services Leader | Investment Product Operations | Asset Management | Transfer Agency | Brokerage Operations

I have known Derek on a personal and professional level for over 20 years.  Derek was instrumental in leading the growth of our asset management business by executing on product launches, fund adoptions, transfer agent and service provider conversions, intermediary oversight and distribution expansion. As a leader, Derek fosters a sense of connection and belonging with his teams which creates an open, trusting environment..  He has an easiness to build interpersonal relations with others and has always been well respected by colleagues and business partners.  His ability to learn, communicate and collaborate across a matrixed organization to deliver business value is what makes him stand out.
